# bottomSeparatorInsets

**Instance Property**

Insets to apply to the bottom separator of the item the configuration applies to.

## Declaration

```swift
var bottomSeparatorInsets: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIListSeparatorConfiguration-swift.struct/automaticInsets].

## Configuring separator insets

- **topSeparatorInsets**: Insets to apply to the top separator of the item the configuration applies to.
- **automaticInsets**: A constant that specifies a placeholder size for separator insets.
